SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Armor
Armor class is where all the constructors, methods, setters and getters take place for the creation of any armor, by using the register based on the ModFormatter class
Armor_interface
Armor_interface class is the graphic interface to assign values to the customized armor
ArmorMaterials
ArmorMaterials enum is where all the key materials are available, it is used to set the methods arguments.
BasicArmorMaterials
BasicArmorMaterials enum is a simple enum that have all the materials to be accessed by the interface
EquipmentSlot
EquipmentSlot enum has the different parts of the armor that can be created and they are used to set the format of the methods
Levels
Level is an enum that identifies which level of material is going to apply the user to its armor
Main
We can create the new armors or weapons from main or using the graphic interface, both work!
Main_Window
Main_Window class is the calls the other graphic interfaces and it is a menu to go to the customization of armors and weapons
ModFormatter
 
Tool
Tool enum is used to declare the type of weapon the user wants to create
Weapon
Weapon class is where all the constructors, methods, setters and getters take place for the creation of any weapon
Weapon_interface
Weapon_interface class is the graphic interface to assign values to the customized weapon
WeaponMaterials
WeaponMaterials enum is where all the key materials are available, if the user types one inexistent material, it will throw an exception
